name: Shell of a Ghost
text: Can be used if you have 0 cards in your hand and you only control "Infernity" monsters. You can take 1 "Infernity Launcher" from your Deck and place it at the top of your Deck. Then place 1 "Infernity Launcher" from outside your Deck at the bottom of your Deck. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
